name: Newspaper FullStack Website
description: A full-stack newspaper platform providing trending news, article management, and secure user authentication.
challenges: Implementing secure JWT authentication with role-based access control.
Ensuring a fully responsive design across all devices.
futurePlans: Adding an AI-based article recommendation system.
Implementing a dark mode for better user experience.
Improving SEO for better search visibility.
Enhancing the admin dashboard with analytics and insights.

name: Marathon Management System
description: A platform for managing marathon events efficiently.
futurePlans: Adding AI-based predictions for race completion times.
Enhancing race analytics with real-time performance tracking.

name: Crowedcube
description: A full-stack investment crowdfunding platform with authentication.
challenges: Optimizing database queries for faster loading times.
Ensuring secure and scalable transaction handling.
futurePlans: Implementing a recommendation system for investments.
Adding blockchain-based security for investor data.

name: Donate For Winter
description: A donation platform built for charity campaigns.
challenges: Ensuring secure payment processing for donations.
Building an intuitive and user-friendly donation flow.
futurePlans: Adding AI-powered fraud detection for transactions.
Implementing multi-currency support for global donations.
